It is often used to express affection for people, especially children at birth or, more sadly, after death. This emoji pops up in a large variety of contexts ranging from innocence, love, Valentine's Day, positive feelings like gratitude, and the Christian faith, especially during Christmas . See also 👶 Baby .

Title: Speaking Head
Description: The silhouette of a person speaking. Faces left-to-right, with lines demonstrating speech being expelled. Sometimes used in the context of shouting or mansplaining .

Title: Bust in Silhouette
Description: Generic profile of one person. Often used in interface design to represent a user.

Title: Busts in Silhouette
Description: Generic profile of two people. Often used in interface design to represent users.

Title: People Hugging
Description: Two people hugging, shown as faceless blue forms on most platforms. Details of each person are not distinct and thus no options are available to customize the gender or skin tone of either individual. Not to be confused with 🤗 Hugging Face , which is less clearly a representation of hugging and sometimes used as jazz hands or to express excitement.

Title: Curly Hair
Description: An emoji component displaying a person's curly hair. Intended for use within emoji sequences.

Title: Bald
Description: An emoji component displaying a person's bald head. Intended for use within emoji sequences.

Title: White Hair
Description: An emoji component displaying a person's white hair. Intended for use within emoji sequences.

Title: Person Frowning
Description: An upset person, frowning with dismay. Gender is not specified, but generally shown as a woman. Previously displayed as a man on Samsung and Microsoft platforms.

Title: Man Frowning
Description: The male version of the 🙍 Person Frowning emoji.

Title: Woman Frowning
Description: The female version of the 🙍 Person Frowning emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

Title: Person Pouting
Description: A person with a serious expression, showing mild displeasure with the situation. Could be considered to be reserved or stoic in response, as this person is not visible angry. Quite different to the Pouting Face Emoji which conveys a more aggressive tone, and is a smiley. Pouting Cat Face is a cat.

Title: Man Pouting
Description: The male version of the 🙎 Person With Pouting Face emoji.

Title: Woman Pouting
Description: The female version of the 🙎 Person With Pouting Face emoji.

Title: Person Gesturing No
Description: A person with arms crossed forming an ‘X’ to indicate ‘no’ or ‘no good’. This motion is used on the TV game show Deal or No Deal to indicate ‘No Deal’.

Title: Man Gesturing No
Description: A woman with arms crossed forming an ‘X’ to indicate ‘no’ or ‘no good’. This motion is used on the TV game show Deal or No Deal to indicate ‘No Deal’. Intended to be gender-neutral but shown as a woman on most platforms.

Title: Woman Gesturing No
Description: A woman with arms crossed forming an ‘X’ to indicate ‘no’ or ‘no good’. This motion is used on the TV game show Deal or No Deal to indicate ‘No Deal’.

Title: Person Gesturing OK
Description: A person with arms above their head, making an ‘OK’ sign (circle) with the whole body. No gender is specified. Previously displayed as an alien or blob on Android, a man on Windows , and a woman on most other platforms .

Title: Man Gesturing OK
Description: The male version of the 🙆 Face With OK Gesture emoji.

Title: Woman Gesturing OK
Description: The female version of the 🙆 Face With OK Gesture emoji.

Title: Person Tipping Hand
Description: A person tipping their hand by their shoulder as if they’re carrying a tray of drinks or flipping their hair. Originally called Information Desk Person . This emoji is commonly used to express sassiness or sarcasm. While no gender is specified, many early designs displayed this emoji as a woman. Google’s 2014 design shows a blob wearing white gloves and a pillbox hat . Microsoft’s 2015 design shows a woman doing this gesture while winking , a facial expression that further reinforces the sassy and sarcastic uses of this emoji.

Title: Man Tipping Hand
Description: A man tipping his hand by his shoulder as if he’s carrying a tray of drinks or flipping his hair. This emoji is commonly used to express sassiness or sarcasm.

Title: Woman Tipping Hand
Description: A woman tipping her hand by her shoulder as if she’s carrying a tray of drinks or flipping her hair. This emoji is commonly used to express sassiness or sarcasm. The earlier gender-unspecified version of this emoji, 💁 Person Tipping Hand , was originally depicted as a woman across most platforms.

Title: Person Raising Hand
Description: A person with its hand in the air, as if it wants to ask or answer a question. Generally displayed as a woman, but is not defined as one particular gender. Previously showed a blob-like gender-inclusive character in the Google artwork.

Title: Man Raising Hand
Description: The man version of the 🙋 Happy Person Raising One Hand emoji.

Title: Woman Raising Hand
Description: The female version of the 🙋 Happy Person Raising One Hand emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

Title: Deaf Woman
Description: A woman gesturing with their index finger between ear and mouth, used as a deaf sign in American Sign Language (ASL) and a number of other global sign languages. Incorrectly displays with a male design within Windows 11 23H2.

Title: Person Bowing
Description: A person bowing deeply which is known as dogeza in Japan. Used to express a sincere apology, or to request a large favour. Many variations of this emoji are misinterpreted as a person doing push-ups, lying down to have a massage, or doing a cute "head resting on hands" gesture.

Title: Man Bowing
Description: The male version of the 🙇 Person Bowing Deeply emoji.

Title: Woman Bowing
Description: The female version of the 🙇 Person Bowing Deeply emoji.

Title: Person Facepalming
Description: A hand shown pressing against the head of a person, commonly written as facepalm . Used to display frustration or embarrassment at the ineptitude of a person or situation. May be used in a similar context to the acronym SMH (shaking my head), or in relation to the Picard Facepalm meme .

Title: Man Facepalming
Description: A hand shown pressing against the head of a man, commonly written as facepalm . Used to display frustration or embarrassment at the ineptitude of a person or situation.

Title: Woman Facepalming
Description: A hand shown pressing against the head of a woman, commonly written as facepalm . Used to display frustration or embarrassment at the ineptitude of a person or situation.

Title: Person Shrugging
Description: A person shrugging their shoulders to indicate a lack of knowledge about a particular topic, or a lack of care about the result of a situation. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ Displays as raised shoulders, sometimes in conjunction with raised arms and flat hands. The shrug gesture in text (emoticon / kaomoji) form is known as a shruggie and typed as: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ The Unicode character Shrug ("Person Shrugging") does not specify a gender, though it was previously shown as a woman on most platforms. See also Woman Shrugging or Man Shrugging .

Title: Man Shrugging
Description: A man shrugging his shoulders to indicate a lack of knowledge about a particular topic, or a lack of care about the result of a situation. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Title: Woman Shrugging
Description: A woman shrugging her shoulders to indicate a lack of knowledge about a particular topic, or a lack of care about the result of a situation. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Title: Breast-Feeding
Description: A woman shown breastfeeding a baby, sometimes looking down to the infant and smiling. This emoji supports skin tone modifiers, which apply to the mother. The head of the baby is recommended to be hidden to avoid a situation where the skin tone of the baby would only correlate to the skin tone of the mother. See 🧑‍🍼 Person Feeding Baby for bottle feeding instead of breastfeeding.

Title: Woman Feeding Baby
Description: A woman feeding a baby with a bottle, sometimes looking down to the infant and smiling. This emoji supports skin tone modifiers, which apply to the adult. The head of the baby is recommended to be hidden to avoid a situation where the skin tone of the baby would only correlate to the skin tone of the adult. Variants include 🧑‍🍼 Person Feeding Baby and 👨‍🍼 Man Feeding Baby . See also 🤱 Breast-Feeding .

Title: Man Feeding Baby
Description: A man feeding a baby with a bottle, sometimes looking down to the infant and smiling. This emoji supports skin tone modifiers, which apply to the adult. The head of the baby is recommended to be hidden to avoid a situation where the skin tone of the baby would only correlate to the skin tone of the adult. Variants include 🧑‍🍼 Person Feeding Baby and 👩‍🍼 Woman Feeding Baby . See also 🤱 Breast-Feeding .

Title: Person Getting Massage
Description: A person getting his or her face massaged. Apple’s artwork for this character shows more of a head massage. Google and Microsoft display a more accurate face massage, with hands rubbing the cheeks and face.

Title: Man Getting Massage
Description: The male version of the 💆 Face Massage emoji.

Title: Woman Getting Massage
Description: The female version of the 💆 Face Massage emoji.

Title: Person Getting Haircut
Description: A person in the process of getting their hair cut, with scissors shown open next to the hair on their head. While no gender is specified, many early designs displayed this emoji as a woman. Windows previously displayed this emoji as a comb and scissors , instead of a person having their hair cut.

Title: Man Getting Haircut
Description: The male version of the 💇 Haircut emoji.

Title: Woman Getting Haircut
Description: The female version of the 💇 Haircut emoji.

Title: Person Walking
Description: A person going for a walk. Taking a slow-medium pace, this person would be a runner if they picked up their speed . This emoji does not specify a gender, but was previously shown as a man on most major platforms.

Title: Man Walking
Description: The male version of the 🚶 Person Walking emoji.

Title: Person Walking Facing Right
Description: A person going for a walk, heading rightwards. Taking a slow-medium pace, this person would be a runner if they picked up their speed .

Title: Woman Walking Facing Right
Description: A woman going for a walk, heading rightwards. Taking a slow-medium pace, this person would be a runner if they picked up their speed .

Title: Man Walking Facing Right
Description: A man going for a walk, heading rightwards. Taking a slow-medium pace, this person would be a runner if they picked up their speed .

Title: Person Standing
Description: A person standing upright. Commonly used to convey awkwardness, particularly on TikTok . Similar in appearance to 🚶 Person Walking , but shown facing forward and without any motion implied.

Title: Man Standing
Description: A man standing upright. Commonly used to convey awkwardness, particularly on TikTok . Similar in appearance to 🚶‍♂️ Man Walking , but shown facing forward and without any motion implied.

Title: Woman Standing
Description: A person standing upright. Commonly used to convey awkwardness, particularly on TikTok . Similar in appearance to 🚶‍♀️ Woman Walking , but shown facing forward and without any motion implied.

Title: Person Kneeling
Description: A person kneeling down on one or both knees. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.

Title: Man Kneeling
Description: A man kneeling down on one or both knees. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.

Title: Woman Kneeling
Description: A woman kneeling down on one or both knees. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.

Title: Person Kneeling Facing Right
Description: A person kneeling down on one or both knees, facing rightwards. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.

Title: Woman Kneeling Facing Right
Description: A woman kneeling down on one or both knees, facing rightwards. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.

Title: Man Kneeling Facing Right
Description: A man kneeling down on one or both knees, facing rightwards. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.

Title: Person with White Cane
Description: A person using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.

Title: Person with White Cane Facing Right
Description: A rightwards-facing person using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.

Title: Man with White Cane
Description: A man using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.

Title: Man with White Cane Facing Right
Description: A rightwards-facing man using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.

Title: Woman with White Cane
Description: A woman using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.

Title: Woman with White Cane Facing Right
Description: A rightwards-facing woman using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.

Title: Person in Motorized Wheelchair Facing Right
Description: A rightwards-facing person using a motorized wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Man in Motorized Wheelchair
Description: A man using a motorized wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Man in Motorized Wheelchair Facing Right
Description: A rightwards-facing man using a motorized wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Woman in Motorized Wheelchair
Description: A woman using a motorized wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Woman in Motorized Wheelchair Facing Right
Description: A rightwards-facing woman using a motorized wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Person in Manual Wheelchair
Description: A person using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Person in Manual Wheelchair Facing Right
Description: A rightwards-facing person using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Man in Manual Wheelchair
Description: A man using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Man in Manual Wheelchair Facing Right
Description: A rightwards-facing man using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Woman in Manual Wheelchair
Description: A woman using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Woman in Manual Wheelchair Facing Right
Description: A rightwards-facing woman using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.

Title: Person Running
Description: A person running, with a large stride and arms outstretched. May be wearing a running shirt . This emoji does not specify a gender, but is shown as a man on most platforms. See also: 🏃‍♀️ Woman Running or 🏃‍♂️ Man Running .

Title: Woman Running
Description: The female version of the 🏃 Runner emoji.

Title: Person Running Facing Right
Description: A person running rightwards, with a large stride and arms outstretched. May be wearing a running shirt .

Title: Woman Running Facing Right
Description: A woman running rightwards, with a large stride and arms outstretched. May be wearing a running shirt .

Title: Man Running Facing Right
Description: A man running rightwards, with a large stride and arms outstretched. May be wearing a running shirt .

Title: Woman Dancing
Description: A person dancing, most commonly displayed as woman with one arm raised wearing a red dress, while dancing the salsa or flamenco. Often used to represent a sense of fun or as a positive affirmation, e.g. "great! 💃" This emoji did not originally specify a gender, but was canonically deemed a woman when the 🕺 Man Dancing emoji was approved . Google previously displayed this emoji as a man , then a gender-neutral blob character (in keeping with guidelines at the time). Microsoft previously displayed this emoji as stick figure , and Samsung has displayed this over various releases as a white boy , black boy , and white girl .

Title: Man Dancing
Description: A man dancing, added as a gender pair for the 💃 Woman Dancing . Shown on most platforms in a 70s-era suit, and one hand in the air in a disco-dancing style.

Title: Person in Suit Levitating
Description: A person wearing a suit, hovering above the ground with a shadow displayed beneath them. Generally shown wearing a fedora or similar style of hat. This character was originally introduced into the Webdings font as an “exclamation mark in the style of the rude boy logo found on records by The Specials ". This levitating man was known as Walt Jabsco.

Title: Person in Steamy Room
Description: A person in a sauna, usually with a towel or robe and sometimes holding a ladle for pouring water on hot stones to create the steamy environment. Popular in Finland , where people sauna in the nude.

Title: Man in Steamy Room
Description: A man in a sauna, usually with a towel or robe and sometimes holding a ladle for pouring water on hot stones to create the steamy environment.

Title: Woman in Steamy Room
Description: A woman in a sauna, usually with a towel or robe and sometimes holding a ladle for pouring water on hot stones to create the steamy environment. Apple and Samsung's designs are also wearing a towel around their head.

Title: Person Climbing
Description: A rock climber, shown climbing up a rock formation. Some platforms show the climber with a helmet and/or rope. The Emojipedia Sample image was created with assistance from World Champion Rock Climber Sasha DiGiulian . Variations exist for 🧗‍♀️ Woman Climbing and 🧗‍♂️ Man Climbing .

Title: Man Climbing
Description: A male rock climber, shown climbing up a rock formation. Some platforms show the climber with a helmet, and/or rope. Variations exist for 🧗‍♀️ Woman Climbing and 🧗 Person Climbing .

Title: Woman Climbing
Description: A female rock climber, shown climbing up a rock formation. Some platforms show the climber with a helmet, and/or rope. Variations exist for 🧗‍♂️ Man Climbing and 🧗 Person Climbing .

Title: Person Fencing
Description: A person shown in the sport of fencing, with a Rapier-style sword , mask, and protective clothing.

Title: Horse Racing
Description: A jockey riding a horse in a horse race. Shown riding to the left of screen on all major platforms. Emoji modifiers change the skin tone of the jockey on some platforms, which can be difficult to discern at small sizes.

Title: Skier
Description: A person downhill-skiiing. Displayed with poles and skis , generally wearing a mask. Platforms vary in display of scarf, helmet, and color of clothing. No gendered options are provided for this emoji. Skin tones support is not recommended for this emoji, but this is supported by some platforms.

Title: Snowboarder
Description: A person snowboarding downhill at a ski resort. Wearing clothing designed for cold climates.

Title: Person Golfing
Description: A person swinging a golf club, attempting to hit a golf ball toward the flag on the green .

Title: Man Golfing
Description: The male version of the 🏌 Golfer emoji.

Title: Woman Golfing
Description: The female version of the 🏌 Golfer emoji.

Title: Person Surfing
Description: A person on a surfboard, riding on a wave in the ocean. Wears a wetsuit or board shorts in most versions.

Title: Man Surfing
Description: The male version of the 🏄 Surfer emoji.

Title: Woman Surfing
Description: The female version of the 🏄 Surfer emoji.

Title: Person Rowing Boat
Description: A small rowboat suitable for a small number of people. Couples or families sometimes hire these as an activity on calm waters.

Title: Man Rowing Boat
Description: The male version of the 🚣 Rowboat emoji.

Title: Woman Rowing Boat
Description: The female version of the 🚣 Rowboat emoji.

Title: Person Swimming
Description: A person swimming in a pool, the ocean , or another body of water. Lacked goggles on prior versions of iOS. Swims facing to the left of screen on all major platforms.

Title: Man Swimming
Description: The male version of the 🏊 Swimmer emoji.

Title: Woman Swimming
Description: The female version of the 🏊 Swimmer emoji.

Title: Person Bouncing Ball
Description: A person with a ball, which is generally displayed as a basketballer running and dribbling (bouncing) the basketball .

Title: Man Bouncing Ball
Description: The male version of the ⛹ Person With Ball emoji.

Title: Woman Bouncing Ball
Description: The female version of the ⛹ Person With Ball emoji.

Title: Person Lifting Weights
Description: A person lifting a barbell loaded with weights above their head.

Title: Man Lifting Weights
Description: The male version of the 🏋 Weight Lifter emoji.

Title: Woman Lifting Weights
Description: The female version of the 🏋 Weight Lifter emoji.

Title: Woman Biking
Description: The female version of the 🚴 Bicyclist emoji.

Title: Person Mountain Biking
Description: A person ( cyclist ) who rides a mountain bike: a type of off-road bicycle . Intended to be gender-neutral.

Title: Man Mountain Biking
Description: The male version of the 🚵 Mountain Bicyclist emoji.

Title: Woman Mountain Biking
Description: The female version of the 🚵 Mountain Bicyclist emoji.

Title: Person Cartwheeling
Description: A person doing a cartwheel, representing the sport of gymnastics. In June 2023 this emoji was at the center of a viral trend (Ba’t 🤸 malungkot 🤸 ang 🤸 beshy 🤸 ko?) based on a scene from an episode of the Philippine television drama anthology show Magpakailanman .

Title: Man Cartwheeling
Description: A man doing a cartwheel, representing the sport of gymnastics.

Title: Woman Cartwheeling
Description: A woman doing a cartwheel, representing the sport of gymnastics.

Title: People Wrestling
Description: Two people in the sport of wrestling.

Title: Men Wrestling
Description: Two men engaged in the sport of wrestling.

Title: Women Wrestling
Description: Two women engaged in the sport of wrestling.

Title: Person Playing Water Polo
Description: A person shown in water with a ball, playing the sport of water polo.

Title: Man Playing Water Polo
Description: A man shown in water with a ball, playing the sport of water polo.

Title: Woman Playing Water Polo
Description: A woman shown in water with a ball, playing the sport of water polo.

Title: Person Playing Handball
Description: A person playing the sport of handball, shown jumping in the air about to throw the ball. Apple's design is shown wearing protective goggles.

Title: Man Playing Handball
Description: A man playing the sport of handball, shown jumping in the air about to throw the ball. Apple's design is shown wearing protective goggles.

Title: Woman Playing Handball
Description: A woman playing the sport of handball, shown jumping in the air about to throw the ball. Apple's design is shown wearing protective goggles.

Title: Person Juggling
Description: A person juggling between three and five colored balls. The person shown in this emoji wears a hat on most major platforms. Early Twitter and Facebook designs previously displayed this emoji as a pair of disembodied hands juggling three colored balls.

Title: Man Juggling
Description: A man juggling between three and five colored balls. The person shown in this emoji wears a hat on most major platforms.

Title: Woman Juggling
Description: A woman juggling between three and five colored balls. The person shown in this emoji wears a hat on most major platforms.

Title: Person in Lotus Position
Description: A sitting person with their eyes closed and their legs crossed in the lotus position. Can be used to broadly represent yoga, meditation, relaxation, or calmness.

Title: Man in Lotus Position
Description: A sitting man with their eyes closed and their legs crossed in the lotus position. Can be used to broadly represent yoga, meditation, relaxation, or calmness.

Title: Woman in Lotus Position
Description: A sitting woman with their eyes closed and their legs crossed in the lotus position. Can be used to broadly represent yoga, meditation, relaxation, or calmness.

Title: Person Taking Bath
Description: A gender-unspecified person taking a soothing bath in a white tub with a shower head. Commonly used for various content concerning bathing, washing, cleaning, and bathrooms more generally. May also represent relaxation and self-care. The appearance of the person, depicted in default yellow, varies. Apple's person is wearing a green shower cap, WhatsApp's a green washcloth. Google’s person appears to be playing in a bubble bath, with soapsuds atop their ahead. Other major vendors show the head of the bather with short, brown or blonde hair. Skin tone modifiers are available on supported platforms. Vendors implement the same or a similar tub and shower head as for their 🛁 Bathtub , but with a person taking/having a bath.

Title: Person in Bed
Description: A bed with a gender-unspecified person sleeping in it, as at a house , hotel , hostel, or other sleeping accommodation. Used especially for various content concerning sleeping as well as beds, furniture, housing, relaxing, and other bedroom activities. Shown with a headboard at the left and footboard with a person under the covers, head on the pillow. Most platforms suggest a wooden frame and feature blue or red sheets. The appearance of the person varies. Apple and Facebook's designs show only the hair of the sleeper, Apple's black and Facebook's brown and tousled. Other major vendors show the head of the sleeper in default yellow with short, brown or blonde hair. Skin tone support is not recommended for this emoji, though it is supported on some platforms . Vendors implement the same style of bed as for their 🛏️ Bed , but with a sleeper in it.

Title: Health Worker
Description: A person working in the field of health care. This may be used to represent a doctor, nurse, or pharmacist.

Title: Man Health Worker
Description: A man working in the field of health care. This may be used to represent a doctor, nurse, or pharmacist. See also: 👩‍⚕️ Female Health Worker

Title: Woman Health Worker
Description: A woman working in the field of health care. This may be used to represent a doctor, nurse, or pharmacist. See also: 👨‍⚕️ Male Health Worker

Title: Student
Description: A person who is engaged in education. Generally depicted wearing a black graduation gown and cap, and occasionally holding a degree certificate or diploma.

Title: Man Student
Description: A man who is engaged in education. Generally depicted wearing a black graduation gown and cap, and occasionally holding a degree certificate or diploma.

Title: Woman Student
Description: A woman who is engaged in education. Generally depicted wearing a black graduation gown and cap, and occasionally holding a degree certificate or diploma.

Title: Man Teacher
Description: A man standing in front of a chalkboard (aka blackboard ) with the intention of teaching a class. Often shown holding a 📕 Closed Book or a pointer .

Title: Woman Teacher
Description: A woman standing in front of a chalkboard (aka blackboard ) with the intention of teaching a class. Often shown holding a 📕 Closed Book or a pointer .

Title: Judge
Description: A person who presides over court proceedings, wearing the traditional black gown and wielding a gavel.

Title: Man Judge
Description: A man who presides over court proceedings, wearing the traditional black gown and wielding a gavel.

Title: Woman Judge
Description: A woman who presides over court proceedings, wearing the traditional black gown and wielding a gavel.

Title: Farmer
Description: A person engaged in agriculture, raising living organisms for food or raw materials. Generally depicted as wearing a wide-brimmed hat and holding a crop (such as carrots or corn) or a pitchfork.

Title: Man Farmer
Description: A man engaged in agriculture, raising living organisms for food or raw materials. Generally depicted as wearing a wide-brimmed hat and holding a crop (such as carrots or corn) or a pitchfork.

Title: Woman Farmer
Description: A woman engaged in agriculture, raising living organisms for food or raw materials. Generally depicted as wearing a wide-brimmed hat and holding a crop (such as carrots or corn) or a pitchfork.

Title: Cook
Description: A person responsible for food preparation wearing a white buttoned chef jacket and toque hat. Usually shown with either a wooden spoon or a skillet frying an egg , though WhatsApp's design is holding a spatula.

Title: Man Cook
Description: A man responsible for food preparation wearing a white buttoned chef jacket and toque hat. Usually shown with either a wooden spoon or a skillet frying an egg , though WhatsApp's design is holding a spatula.

Title: Woman Cook
Description: A woman responsible for food preparation wearing a white buttoned chef jacket and toque hat. Usually shown with either a wooden spoon or a skillet frying an egg , though WhatsApp's design is holding a spatula.

Title: Mechanic
Description: A person engaged in the construction, maintenance, or repair of machinery. Depicted wearing overalls and holding a wrench . Frequently also shown wearing a billed cap .

Title: Man Mechanic
Description: A man engaged in the construction, maintenance, or repair of machinery. Depicted wearing overalls and holding a wrench . Frequently also shown wearing a billed cap .

Title: Woman Mechanic
Description: A woman engaged in the construction, maintenance, or repair of machinery. Depicted wearing overalls and holding a wrench . Frequently also shown wearing a billed cap .

Title: Factory Worker
Description: A person working in a factory setting, depicted as wearing overalls and protective headgear while holding an active welding gun.

Title: Man Factory Worker
Description: A man working in a factory setting, depicted as wearing overalls and protective headgear while holding an active welding gun.

Title: Woman Factory Worker
Description: A woman working in a factory setting, depicted as wearing overalls and protective headgear while holding an active welding gun.

Title: Office Worker
Description: A person wearing business attire. This may include items such as a shirt, tie, jacket, or headset.

Title: Man Office Worker
Description: A man wearing business attire. This may include items such as a shirt, tie, jacket, or headset.

Title: Scientist
Description: A person who is studying or has expert knowledge of one or more of the natural or physical sciences. Generally depicted wearing safety goggles and a white l ab coat while holding a test tube or beaker filled with colorful liquid.

Title: Man Scientist
Description: A man who is studying or has expert knowledge of one or more of the natural or physical sciences. Generally depicted wearing safety goggles and a white lab coat while holding a test tube filled with colorful liquid.

Title: Woman Scientist
Description: A woman who is studying or has expert knowledge of one or more of the natural or physical sciences. Generally depicted wearing safety goggles and a white lab coat while holding a test tube filled with colorful liquid.

Title: Technologist
Description: A person behind a computer screen, working in the field of technology. Usually shown working on a laptop , though Google's design appears to be using a desktop computer instead. The laptop in Apple's design includes the Apple logo, as per a Macbook. Samsung and Huawei's designs include their company's logotype, while the designs from Microsoft, WhatsApp, Telegram, and JoyPixels show their logomark.

Title: Man Technologist
Description: A man behind a computer screen, working in the field of technology. See also: 👩‍💻 Female Technologist

Title: Woman Technologist
Description: A woman behind a computer screen, working in the field of technology. See also: 👨‍💻 Male Technologist

Title: Singer
Description: A singer or rock star generally displayed with a microphone , and sometimes musical notes . iOS and Android display this emoji as a Bowie -esque figure while WhatsApp appears heavily inspired by Prince .

Title: Woman Singer
Description: A woman singer or rock star generally displayed with a microphone , and sometimes musical notes . iOS and Android display this emoji as a Bowie -esque figure while WhatsApp appears heavily inspired by Prince .

Title: Artist
Description: A person engaged in the visual art of painting, shown holding a palette and paintbrush .

Title: Man Artist
Description: A man engaged in the visual art of painting, shown holding a palette and paintbrush .

Title: Woman Artist
Description: A woman engaged in the visual art of painting, shown holding a palette and paintbrush .

Title: Pilot
Description: A person tasked with flying an aircraft, such as an ✈️ Airplane or a 🚁 Helicopter , shown wearing a traditional airline pilot uniform.

Title: Man Pilot
Description: A man tasked with flying an aircraft, such as an ✈️ Airplane or a 🚁 Helicopter , shown wearing a traditional airline pilot uniform.

Title: Astronaut
Description: An astronaut or cosmonaut shown wearing a space suit and helmet.

Title: Man Astronaut
Description: A male astronaut or cosmonaut shown wearing a space suit and helmet.

Title: Woman Astronaut
Description: A female astronaut or cosmonaut shown wearing a space suit and helmet.

Title: Firefighter
Description: A person professionally tasked with controlling and extinguishing fires.

Title: Man Firefighter
Description: A man professionally tasked with controlling and extinguishing fires.

Title: Woman Firefighter
Description: A woman professionally tasked with controlling and extinguishing fires.

Title: Police Officer
Description: A police officer wearing a blue hat with a gold badge or shield in the middle. See also 👮‍♀️ Woman Police Officer or 👮‍♂️ Man Police Officer

Title: Man Police Officer
Description: The male version of the 👮 Police Officer emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

Title: Woman Police Officer
Description: The female version of the 👮 Police Officer emoji.

Title: Detective
Description: An undercover investigator, wearing a hat, and sometimes using a magnifying glass to closely inspect evidence. This emoji did not originally recommend emoji modifiers, but a proposal was created to address this.

Title: Man Detective
Description: The male version of the 🕵 Sleuth or Spy emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

Title: Woman Detective
Description: The female version of the 🕵 Sleuth or Spy emoji.

Title: Guard
Description: A British guardsman, known as a foot guard. Wears a tall black hat with a yellow chin-strap. Must look straight ahead at all times, even when tourists attempt to distract them.

Title: Man Guard
Description: The male version of the 💂 Guardsman emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

Title: Woman Guard
Description: The female version of the 💂 Guardsman emoji.

Title: Ninja
Description: A person dressed as a ninja with a black hood, a mask covering the lower half of their face, and the hilt of a knife or sword emerging from behind their shoulder. The now-discontinued Microsoft ZWJ sequence 🐱‍👤 Ninja Cat did not include the ninja emoji at all as it was developed several years before ninja was approved. It combined 🐱 Cat Face and 👤 Bust in Silhouette and was only available from Microsoft prior to the debut of the Fluent emoji set in November 2021.

Title: Construction Worker
Description: A construction worker wearing a hard-hat ( safety helmet ). Has a high visibility vest or hammer in some variations. Some platforms display a green cross on the helmet which is used in Japan as a safety reminder in construction zones. It is also commonly seen on the Met helmet in the game Mega Man.

Title: Man Construction Worker
Description: The male version of the 👷 Construction Worker emoji.

Title: Woman Construction Worker
Description: The female version of the 👷 Construction Worker emoji.

Title: Person with Crown
Description: A person wearing a crown. 👸 Princess and 🤴 Prince were added in 2015 and 2016, respectively. Person With Crown was created to represent royalty without being overly specific about gender.

Title: Prince
Description: Male royalty, intended as a gender pair for the princess emoji . Shown as a man with a crown. Not a reference to the musician Prince , however the man singer emoji on WhatsApp does show a character that bears a heavy resemblance to this artist.

Title: Princess
Description: The face of a princess; a girl or woman wearing a small crown or tiara. Could also be used to represent a Queen or other royalty.

Title: Person in Tuxedo
Description: A person dressed for a formal occasion, wearing a tuxedo. No gender is specified for this emoji. See also Woman in Tuxedo and Man in Tuxedo .

Title: Man in Tuxedo
Description: A man dressed for a formal occasion, wearing a tuxedo.

Title: Woman in Tuxedo
Description: A woman dressed for a formal occasion, wearing a tuxedo.

Title: Person with Veil
Description: A person in traditional western wedding dress with a veil over their head.

Title: Man with Veil
Description: A man wearing a traditional Western wedding dress with a veil over their head.

Title: Woman with Veil
Description: A woman wearing a traditional western wedding dress with a veil over their head.

Title: Santa Claus
Description: Santa Claus, sometimes referred to as Father Christmas , brings joy to children at Christmas time. Displayed with a beard and red festive hat. The Santa emoji had a frown on Android 4.4 , which was resolved in Android 5.0. See also: Christmas emoji list . Note: Father Christmas has a different origin to Santa Claus but both are represented by this single emoji.

Title: Mrs. Claus
Description: Mother Christmas, more commonly known as Mrs. Claus, is the wife of Santa Claus. Displayed as an older woman with glasses and a festive red and white bonnet. See also: Christmas emoji list .

Title: Mx Claus
Description: A person, generally depicted as being older with gray hair, wearing a red Christmas (aka "Santa") hat. Does not represent any specific character in folklore. Mx Claus provides a gender inclusive alternative to 🎅 Santa Claus or 🤶 Mrs. Claus . Apple depicts Mx Claus as wearing glasses , while other vendors do not. Mx is an honorific that does not indicate gender .

Title: Superhero
Description: A person who wields abilities beyond those of ordinary people and is dedicated to protecting the public. Generally depicted as wearing a colorful domino mask and a cape. This base emoji does not specify a gender, but is used to create the emojis for Man Superhero and Woman Superhero . The Supervillain is the nemesis of this emoji.

Title: Man Superhero
Description: A man who wields abilities beyond those of ordinary people and is dedicated to protecting the public. Generally depicted as wearing a colorful domino mask and a cape. The Supervillain is the nemesis of this emoji.

Title: Woman Superhero
Description: A woman who wields abilities beyond those of ordinary people and is dedicated to protecting the public. Generally depicted as wearing a colorful domino mask and a cape. The Supervillain is the nemesis of this emoji.

Title: Supervillain
Description: A person who wields abilities beyond those of ordinary people who, unlike their nemesis the Superhero , uses their powers for evil. This base emoji does not specify a gender, but is used to create the emojis for Man Supervillain and Woman Supervillain . Google's design is similar to that of Mr. Sinister from the X-Men Marvel comics.

Title: Man Supervillain
Description: A man who wields abilities beyond those of ordinary people who, unlike their nemesis the Superhero , uses their powers for evil. Google's design is similar to that of Mr. Sinister from the X-Men Marvel comics.

Title: Mage
Description: A person who wields magical powers derived from supernatural or occult sources.

Title: Man Mage
Description: A man who wields magical powers derived from supernatural or occult sources. May also be referred to as a wizard, warlock, or sorcerer.

Title: Woman Mage
Description: A woman who wields magical powers derived from supernatural or occult sources. May also be referred to as a witch, enchantress, or sorceress.

Title: Fairy
Description: A magical humanoid creature found in myths and fantasy stories. Generally depicted as having insect-inspired wings, it can also be assumed to be quite diminutive in size. This emoji supports skin tones, and variations that are female or male .

Title: Man Fairy
Description: A magical male creature found in myths and fantasy stories. Generally depicted as having insect-inspired wings, it can also be assumed to be quite diminutive in size.

Title: Woman Fairy
Description: A magical female creature found in myths and fantasy stories. Generally depicted as having insect-inspired wings, it can also be assumed to be quite diminutive in size.

Title: Vampire
Description: A vampire shown wearing a dark cape, and with pointed fangs. This emoji supports skin tones, and variations that are female or male . May be used to call someone an "energy vampire", i.e. a person whose actions leave others exhausted or drained of energy

Title: Man Vampire
Description: A male vampire shown wearing a dark cape, and with pointed fangs.

Title: Woman Vampire
Description: A female vampire shown wearing a dark cape, and with pointed fangs.

Title: Merperson
Description: A merperson who may be referred to as merfolk or merpeople in plural. May be used for the display of a mermaid, mergirl, merwoman , or merman . Occasional shown wielding a trident .

Title: Merman
Description: The male version of the 🧜 Merperson emoji.

Title: Mermaid
Description: The female version of the 🧜 Merperson emoji.

Title: Man Elf
Description: A male creature with pointed ears and a human-like face.

Title: Woman Elf
Description: A female creature with pointed ears and a human-like face.

Title: Genie
Description: A supernatural being, which is generally shown to be imprisoned within a bottle or lamp. May be capable of granting wishes when summoned. Variations exist for a female genie or male genie . Several vendors' design for this emoji is highly reminiscent of The Genie character from Disney's Aladdin films.

Title: Man Genie
Description: A supernatural male being, which is generally shown to be imprisoned within a bottle or lamp. May be capable of granting wishes when summoned.

Title: Woman Genie
Description: A supernatural female being, which is generally shown to be imprisoned within a bottle or lamp. May be capable of granting wishes when summoned.

Title: Zombie
Description: A reanimated human, often found in works of horror fiction. May have a female or male appearance. May be used to refer to someone who appears listless, apathetic, or unresponsive to their surroundings. May also be used to refer to a person who attempts to resume communications after previously ghosting out of a conversation.

Title: Man Zombie
Description: A reanimated human man, often found in works of horror fiction.

Title: Woman Zombie
Description: A reanimated human woman, often found in works of horror fiction.

Title: Troll
Description: A green troll, usually shown holding a club. May be used to refer to the fantasy creature. May also be used to refer to an internet troll or the act of trolling. Apple’s troll holds a scepter instead of a club. Microsoft, Twitter, and WhatsApp's designs show only the bust of a troll instead of the full-bodied creature.

Title: People with Bunny Ears
Description: An iteration of the Playboy Bunny known in Japan as a Bunny Girl . Usually depicted as an attractive woman  wearing bunny ears; a bunny girl can also be seen in anime as a hybrid human/animal known as Kemonomimi . Some versions of this emoji, such as Apple’s, display two girls dancing, each wearing a leotard and bunny ears. Other interpretations show the face of one woman wearing bunny ears. The two-person version of this emoji is often used as a display of friendship, fun, or "let's party".

Title: Men with Bunny Ears
Description: The male version of the 👯 Woman With Bunny Ears emoji.

Title: Women with Bunny Ears
Description: A female version of the 👯 People With Bunny Ears emoji.

Title: People Holding Hands
Description: Two people holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship. No gender is specified for these two people, meaning they are likely to be shown with a gender inclusive design.

Title: Women Holding Hands
Description: Two women holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship.

Title: Woman and Man Holding Hands
Description: A woman and man holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship.

Title: Men Holding Hands
Description: Two men holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship.

Title: Kiss
Description: A kissing gesture, shown with a pink love heart floating in the air between two people. No gender is specified for the two people, and as such this may be used to represent the concept of a couple broadly, and/or as a means of showing two non-binary people. Previously shown with the same appearance as 👩‍❤️‍💋‍👨 Kiss: Woman, Man , but now displays two people with an ambiguous gender appearance.

Title: Kiss: Woman, Man
Description: A woman and a man displayed kissing, or gesturing a kiss toward each other.

Title: Kiss: Man, Man
Description: Two men displayed kissing, or gesturing a kiss toward each other. At small sizes this may be difficult to discern from the two women kissing .

Title: Kiss: Woman, Woman
Description: Two women displayed kissing, or gesturing a kiss toward each other. At small sizes this may be difficult to discern from two men kissing .

Title: Couple with Heart
Description: A couple standing next to each other, smiling, with a love heart floating in the air between them. No gender is specified for the two people, and as such this may be used to represent the concept of a couple broadly, and/or as a means of showing two non-binary people. Previously shown with the same appearance as 👩‍❤️‍👨 Couple With Heart: Woman, Man , but now displays two people with an ambiguous gender appearance.

Title: Couple with Heart: Woman, Man
Description: A woman and a man standing next to each other, smiling, with a love heart floating in the air between them.

Title: Couple with Heart: Man, Man
Description: Two men standing next to each other, smiling, with a love heart floating in the air between them.

Title: Couple with Heart: Woman, Woman
Description: Two women standing next to each other, smiling, with a love heart floating in the air between them.

Title: Family: Man, Woman, Boy
Description: A family with a father, mother, and one son.

Title: Family: Man, Woman, Girl
Description: A family with a father, mother, and one daughter.

Title: Family: Man, Woman, Girl, Boy
Description: A family with a father, mother, daughter, and son.

Title: Family: Man, Woman, Girl, Girl
Description: A family with a father, mother, and two daughters.

Title: Family: Man, Man, Boy
Description: A family with two fathers, and one son.

Title: Family: Man, Man, Girl
Description: A family with two fathers, and one daughter.

Title: Family: Man, Man, Girl, Boy
Description: A family with two fathers, one daughter, and one son.

Title: Family: Man, Man, Boy, Boy
Description: A family with two fathers, and two sons.

Title: Family: Man, Man, Girl, Girl
Description: A family with two fathers, and two daughters.

Title: Family: Woman, Woman, Boy
Description: A family with two mothers, and one son.

Title: Family: Woman, Woman, Girl
Description: A family with two mothers, and one daughter.

Title: Family: Woman, Woman, Girl, Boy
Description: A family with two mothers, one daughter, and one son.

Title: Family: Woman, Woman, Boy, Boy
Description: A family with two mothers, and two sons.

Title: Family: Woman, Woman, Girl, Girl
Description: A family with two mothers, and two daughters.

Title: Family: Man, Boy
Description: A family with a father and son.

Title: Family: Man, Boy, Boy
Description: A family with a father and two sons.

Title: Family: Man, Girl
Description: A family consisting of a single male parent and one daughter.

Title: Family: Man, Girl, Boy
Description: A family with a single male parent, one daughter, and one son.

Title: Family: Man, Girl, Girl
Description: Emojipedia is brought to you by Zedge, the world's #1 phone personalization app

Title: Family: Woman, Boy
Description: Emojipedia is brought to you by Zedge, the world's #1 phone personalization app

Title: Family: Woman, Boy, Boy
Description: Emojipedia is brought to you by Zedge, the world's #1 phone personalization app

Title: Family: Woman, Girl
Description: Emojipedia is brought to you by Zedge, the world's #1 phone personalization app

Title: Family: Woman, Girl, Boy
Description: Emojipedia is brought to you by Zedge, the world's #1 phone personalization app

Title: Family: Woman, Girl, Girl
Description: Emojipedia is brought to you by Zedge, the world's #1 phone personalization app

Title: Family
Description: A family unit shown with two adults and one child . Previously displayed with the same design as 👨‍👩‍👦 Family: Man, Woman, Boy on most platforms, but now has its own gender inclusive appearance.

Title: Family: Adult, Adult, Child
Description: A family unit shown with two adults and one child . Usually depicted as a collection of silhouettes on a block color background, as per Unicode's recommendations.

Title: Family: Adult, Adult, Child, Child
Description: A family unit shown with two adults and two children . Usually depicted as a collection of silhouettes on a block color background, as per Unicode's recommendations .

Title: Family: Adult, Child, Child
Description: A family unit shown with one adult and two children . Usually depicted as a collection of silhouettes on a block color background, as per Unicode's recommendations .

Title: Monkey Face
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a monkey, looking straight ahead. Depicted as a brown-haired monkey with a tan or pinkish face, round ears, nostrils, and open-mouthed grin. As with the full-bodied 🐒 Monkey , often used with a playful tone or for metaphorical senses of monkey . One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . Available as an Apple Animoji . Vendors implement the same or similar monkey face in their Three Wise Monkeys emojis: 🙈 See-No-Evil Monkey , 🙉 Hear-No-Evil Monkey , and 🙊 Speak-No-Evil Monkey . Facebook’s monkey previously resembled 🐻 Bear Face . This emoji is considered racist in some contexts , particularly when used to disparage, insult, and abuse people with dark skin, especially Black people.

Title: Monkey
Description: A monkey, a small primate with long limbs and tail for climbing trees. Generally depicted as a cartoon-styled, brown monkey with a cheeky facial expression, shown in full profile facing left, sitting on its hind legs with a long, curled tail and round ears. As with 🐵 Monkey Face , often used with a playful tone or for metaphorical senses of monkey . One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . WhatsApp’s monkey is facing right, Facebook’s has shaggy hair. This emoji is considered racist in some contexts , particularly when used to disparage, insult, and abuse people with dark skin, especially Black people.

Title: Gorilla
Description: A gorilla, the powerful, black-haired great ape. Variously depicted in full profile on all fours facing left or as a friendly, cartoon-styled gorilla face looking straight ahead. Most platforms' designs depict a full gorilla, as a silverback , with strong shoulders and reddish forehead. Twitter’s designs feature a black and gray gorilla face with a neutral expression and prominent forehead and jaw. Google , Samsung , and Facebook’s designs previously featured only a gorilla face. This emoji is considered racist in some contexts , particularly when used to disparage, insult, and abuse people with dark skin, especially Black people.

Title: Orangutan
Description: An orangutan, the orange-haired ape with long arms. Depicted facing forward, with a long broad face and sitting with its legs bent. Occasionally shown scratching its head. Color varies across platforms, ranging from orange to light brown. This emoji is considered racist in some contexts , particularly when used to disparage, insult, and abuse people with dark skin, especially Black people.

Title: Dog Face
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a dog, looking straight ahead. Depicted as the face of a dog of various breeds, generally light-brown and white, with pointed or floppy ears and its tongue hanging out. May be used with a more playful tone than the full-bodied 🐕 Dog , though their applications generally overlap. See also 🐩 Poodle . One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . Available as an Apple Animoji . Many vendors implement the same or similar dog as their full-bodied 🐕 Dog , such as Google and Facebook. Apple and WhatsApp’s dogs have a white face with brown, floppy ears and a brown patch over one eye. Included in the earliest Japanese emoji sets from Softbank , Docomo , and au by KDDI .

Title: Guide Dog
Description: A guide (or Seeing Eye) dog , trained to help lead a person who is blind or visually impaired. Generally depicted as a yellowish-brown Labrador Retriever on all fours facing left, equipped with a harness and handle. Many platforms additionally include a collar. Not to be confused with 🐕‍🦺 Service Dog , though their popular applications may overlap. Twitter implements the same dog as its 🐕 Dog . Samsung and Twitter’s guide dogs have green harnesses.

Title: Service Dog
Description: A service animal displayed with a safety vest and lead. Differs from the guide dog as this animal is intended for detection of seizures or other “hidden disabilities”, according to the proposal from Apple .

Title: Poodle
Description: A poodle , a popular dog breed with curly hair, often groomed in an ornamental pattern. Generally depicted as a grayish-white poodle in full profile on all fours facing left, with a shaved torso, legs, and face with fuller, pom-pom-like hair on its head, ears, chest, feet, and tip of tail (as the Continental Clip ). Like 🐕 Dog , may be used to represent a variety of dog breeds (often fluffy or long-haired). See also 🐶 Dog Face . Google , Samsung , and Facebook’s designs previously featured pink poodles.

Title: Wolf
Description: The face of a wolf, a howling canine that hunts in packs. Generally depicted as a cartoon-styled face of a gray wolf with pointed ears, white cheeks and muzzle, and black nose. Its expression is variously neutral, friendly, or slightly menacing, as in Google and Samsung’s designs. Apple and Huawei's designs features the head of gray wolf, facing left. Occasionally used to represent metaphorical senses of wolf , e.g., lone wolf , wolf pack . Apple and SoftBank’s designs previously resembled a reddish-brown canine, resembling a dog or fox .

Title: Fox
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled faced of a fox, the cunning canine, looking straight ahead. Depicted as an orange fox  face with a black nose, pointed ears, and shaggy, white cheeks. Often used with an affectionate or playful tone (e.g., slang, foxy ). Does not have a full-bodied fox emoji counterpart. Available as an Apple Animoji .

Title: Raccoon
Description: A raccoon, a nocturnal mammal with a mask around its eyes. Generally depicted as a friendly, cartoon-styled, gray raccoon face looking straight ahead, with black-and-white markings around its eyes and pointed ears and cheeks. Apple and WhatsApp’s designs feature a raccoon in full profile on all fours facing left with a striped, bushy tail.

Title: Cat Face
Description: Meow! A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a cat, looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as a yellowish-orange cat face with pointed ears and whiskers. May be used with a more affectionate tone than the full-bodied 🐈 Cat , though their applications generally overlap. Available as an Apple Animoji . Vendors implement the same or similar cat in their 🐈 Cat as well as in their cat-faced variants of smileys: 😼 Cat Face With Wry Smile 😹 Cat Face With Tears of Joy 🙀 Weary Cat Face 😾 Pouting Cat Face 😿 Crying Cat Face 😻 Smiling Cat Face With Heart-Eyes 😺 Grinning Cat Face 😸 Grinning Cat Face With Smiling Eyes 😽 Kissing Cat Face Google’s cat face was previously orange, Samsung’s gray, and Facebook’s once gray and white. Included in the earliest Japanese emoji sets from Softbank , Docomo , and au by KDDI .

Title: Cat
Description: A domestic cat, beloved as a pet. Generally depicted as a light-orange cat with stripes, as a tabby , in full profile on all fours facing left, with its long tell held upright. See also 🐱 Cat Face . Google’s cat is cartoon-styled, shown sitting on its hind legs with a friendly expression and whiskers. Facebook’s cat is a gray tabby, though previously was orange. Microsoft and Samsung’s cats were previously gray, Twitter’s brown.

Title: Lion
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a lion—the large cat and king of the jungle—looking straight ahead. Depicted as a golden-yellow lion face with a light- or dark-brown mane, white muzzle, and neutral expression. Often used with an affectionate tone. Does not have a full-bodied lion emoji counterpart. A lion is represented as ♌ Leo in the Western zodiac. Available as an Apple Animoji . Apple's lion previously featured a timid-looking expression.

Title: Tiger Face
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a tiger looking straight ahead. Generally depicted in yellowish-orange with black stripes on its forehead and cheeks, a white muzzle, and neutral expression. Often used with a more affectionate tone than the full-bodied 🐅 Tiger . Available as an Apple Animoji .

Title: Tiger
Description: A tiger, a large cat with an orange coat and black stripes. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long tail, its distinctive stripes, and, on some platforms, white patches. See also 🐯 Tiger Face . Not to be confused with 🐆 Leopard . One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . Google’s design is noticeably more cartoon-styled, as Facebook’s previously was. Microsoft’s design previously featured a yellow, forward-facing tiger, as if on the prowl.

Title: Leopard
Description: A leopard, a large cat with a yellowish-brown coat and black-and-gold spots. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long tail and its distinctive pattern. Sometimes used to represent jaguars, panthers, cheetahs, and related cats. May also be used to indicate leopard prints in fashion. Not to be confused with 🐅 Tiger . Google’s design is noticeably more cartoon-styled. Microsoft’s design was previously solid yellowish-brown in color, resembling a cougar or mountain lion.

Title: Horse Face
Description: The face of a horse, generally facing left. Depicted as a light or reddish-brown horse with a dark brown or black mane, and, on many platforms, a light-colored muzzle. Not to be confused with the full-bodied 🐎 Horse or 🏇 Horse Racing , though their applications may overlap. Some vendors implement a similar design in 🦄 Unicorn Face and 🦓 Zebra . WhatsApp’s horse is facing left, as Facebook’s previously was. Microsoft’s horse was previously looking straight ahead, as was Samsung’s , shown with a goofy, full-toothed grin. Softbank previously featured a full-bodied horse.

Title: Moose
Description: A moose head with large antlers. Can be used to talk about the actual animal. Can also be used to represent countries including Canada and Sweden, where the moose is considered a national symbol. Can also be used alongside the phrase "cool as a moose." Google’s Moose is facing left, while Twitter displays a full-bodied moose

Title: Donkey
Description: A grey donkey or mule, shown in full profile, sometimes with its hind legs kicking into the air. Can be used literally to represent the pack animal. Can also be used metaphorically to call someone a jackass or to say that someone is stubborn as a mule . Because the donkey is a symbol of the Democratic Party of the United States, it may be used in political contexts. Additionally, the term mule can refer to someone who carries illegal drugs across borders, so this emoji may be used to talk about smugglers and the act of smuggling.

Title: Horse
Description: A horse, a hoofed mammal used for riding and racing. Depicted as a brown horse in full profile galloping to the left, with a dark, flowing mane and tail. May be used to represent various types of horses and their metaphorical senses (e.g., mustang , stallion ). May also be used as a compliment to an attractive person. One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac .a Not to be confused with 🐴 Horse Face , 🎠 Carousel Horse , and 🏇 Horse Racing , which features a jockey on its back. Apple’s horse is wearing a green saddle blanket, Facebook’s a blue blanket with saddle. SoftBank’s design previously featured a racing horse with a jockey.

Title: Unicorn
Description: The face of a unicorn , a mythical creature in the form of a white horse with a single, long horn on its forehead. Generally depicted as a white horse head facing left with a pink or purple mane and a yellow or rainbow-colored horn. In addition to the mythical unicorn, may be used to convey whimsy, fantasy, uniqueness, specialness, peace, and love. Often used for various content related to the LGBTQ community , thanks in part to its rainbow colors on many platforms. Also often used in association with “unicorn” startups. Sometimes used as a rainbow or holographic accent color. Vendors implement the emoji with the same or similar design as 🐴 Horse Face , but with colorful hair and a horn. Available as an Apple Animoji . WhatsApp’s unicorn is facing right. Google’s unicorn previously had a brown mane, Samsung’s a pink mane. Twitter’s unicorn was previously purple-colored with a blue mane.

Title: Zebra
Description: A zebra, a horse-like mammal with black-and-white stripes. Variously depicted in full profile on all fours facing left or as a zebra head facing left with a short mane. Not to be confused with 🐎 Horse . Some vendors implement a similar face as their 🐴 Horse Face . Apple, Microsoft, WhatsApp, Samsung, and Facebook’s designs feature the full animal; Google and Twitter's designs feature a head with a short mane and black muzzle. Facebook’s design previously featured only a zebra head, as did Samsung's .

Title: Deer
Description: A deer, a fleet-footed, hoofed mammal whose males ( bucks , stags ) generally have antlers. Variously depicted as a light-brown deer in full profile on all fours facing left or as a deer face looking straight head; both depictions feature large, branched antlers. May be used to represent elk, moose, antelope, or reindeer, especially in connection with Christmas . Most platforms display a deer in full profile. Twitter shows a deer face. Google’s deer previously had a red nose, as Rudolph the Red-nosed Reindeer . Apple and WhatsApp’s deers are white-tailed .

Title: Bison
Description: A brown bison shown in full profile with horns, a beard, and woolly mane. Also called a buffalo in North America.

Title: Cow Face
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a cow looking straight ahead. Variously depicted as a white, brown, or multicolored cow face with a neutral expression, short horns, and a pink or brown muzzle. Often used with a more affectionate tone than the full-bodied 🐄 Cow . Facebook’s design once featured a more lifelike, brown cow face.

Title: Ox
Description: An ox, a bovine used as a draft animal. Depicted in brown in full profile on all fours facing left, with a tail and short horns. One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . Often used to represent ♉ Taurus (the Bull) in the Western zodiac. 2021 is Year of the Ox . Often used to represent a bull and occasionally paired with 💩 Pile of Poo to stand in for slang terms. Not to be confused with 🐃 Water Buffalo .

Title: Water Buffalo
Description: A water buffalo , a bovine used to plough rice fields in parts of Asia. Depicted in gray or black in full profile on all fours facing left, with a tail and broad horns curled up at the tips. Often used to represent a bull. Not to be confused with 🐂 Ox , though their applications may overlap. Microsoft’s design was previously brown.

Title: Cow
Description: A cow, a bovine farmed for its meat or milk. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left with a black-and-white patched coat (as a Holstein Friesian ) and, on many platforms, a pink udder and horns. May be used to represent the animal, its food products, or black-and-white coloring. See also 🐮 Cow Face . Microsoft's cow was previously brown, as was Facebook's , which had a bell around its neck.

Title: Pig Face
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a pig looking straight ahead. Depicted as a pink face with a neutral expression, pointed or floppy ears, and distinctive pig nose . Often used with a more affectionate tone than the full-bodied 🐖 Pig . Available as an Apple Animoji . Apple’s face bears a slight grin and previously featured floppy ears.

Title: Pig
Description: A pig, a plump animal farmed for its meat, such as bacon . Depicted in light pink in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long snout and short, curly tail. May be used to represent the animal, its food products, or various metaphorical senses of pig . One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac ; 2019 is the Year of the Pig. See also 🐷 Pig Face , 🐽 Pig Nose , and 🐗 Boar . WhatsApp’s design previously featured a wide grin.

Title: Boar
Description: A boar, a hairy, wild pig with tusks. Generally depicted as the face of a brown boar, either facing left or looking straight ahead, with prominent tusks projecting from its lower jaw. Twitter's design feature a friendly, cartoon-styled face, as did an early Facebook design. WhatsApp’s design displays the animal in full, as Google , Microsoft , and Samsung previously did. Not to be confused with 🐖 Pig or 🐷 Pig Face , though their applications may overlap. Available as an Apple Animoji .

Title: Pig Nose
Description: The snout of a pig. Depicted as a pink oval or slightly pear-shaped nose with two black nostrils. See also 🐖 Pig and 🐷 Pig Face . Previously displayed as a cute pig character on Google Gmail .

Title: Ram
Description: A ram, a male sheep with large, spiraling horns. Generally depicted in full profile on all fours facing left with a thick, white fleece and light-brown horns. Occasionally used to represent antelopes and related animals. Not to be confused with 🐑 Ewe , though their applications may overlap. Often considered (in lieu of 🐐 Goat ) one of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . Also often used to represent ♈ Aries (the Ram) in the Western zodiac. WhatsApp and Facebook’s designs resemble a bighorn sheep, as Apple’s once did. Google's design previously had its eyes closed.

Title: Goat
Description: A goat, a sturdy, hoofed animal raised for its meat and milk. Depicted as a light brown, white, or multicored goat in full profile on all fours facing left, a scraggly beard, upright tail, and brown or yellow horns curving back. Frequently used as a visual shorthand for the slang expression GOAT , or the Great of All Time , often said of athletes and in particular the late Kobe Bryant . Often considered one of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . Also often used to represent ♑ Capricorn in the Western zodiac. Apple , Google , and Samsung’s goats were previously white, as a Saanen goat . Facebook’s design previously featured only a goat face.

Title: Camel
Description: A dromedary camel, a long-necked mammal with one large hump on its back. Depicted in light or yellowish brown in full profile on all fours facing left. Not to be confused with 🐫 Two-Hump Camel ( Bactrian ), though their applications generally overlap. May be used in association with deserts, the Middle East, and Wednesday ( Hump Day ). Samsung’s design features a camel with a shaggy head of hair and slight smile. Google’s design previously featured a blanket on its back, as for transport.

Title: Llama
Description: A llama, a long-necked, camel -like animal, native to South America and used for transport and wool. Depicted as a shaggy white, light-brown, or multicolored llama in full profile on all fours facing left. May be used to represent an alpaca or related animals.

Title: Elephant
Description: An elephant, the largest land animal on Earth, with a long trunk and, often, tusks. Generally depicted in gray in full profile on all fours facing left, with tusks and prominent ears, as an African (vs. Asian ) elephant. Google and Facebook’s elephants were previously blue in color. Samsung’s design previously featured a cartoon-styled elephant with a red blanket on its back and blowing a red heart from its trunk. Because the elephant is a symbol of the Republican Party of the United States, it may be used in political contexts

Title: Mammoth
Description: A brown wooly mammoth with large curved tusks. Can also be used to represent a mastodon.

Title: Rhinoceros
Description: A rhinoceros, a large mammal with one or two massive horns on its nose. Generally shown in light gray with two horns, depicted in full profile on all fours or as a rhinoceros head looking left. Resembles the white or black rhinoceros . Apple, Google, Microsoft, WhatsApp, and Facebook’s designs feature the full animal, while Samsung and Twitter’s designs feature only the rhinoceros' head. Facebook’s design previously featured just the rhinoceros' head, as did Google's .

Title: Hippopotamus
Description: A hippopotamus, a squat water mammal with huge jaws. Generally depicted in gray or tan in full profile facing left. Google’s design used to feature a purple, cartoon-styled hippopotamus face. Facebook’s hippopotamus is opening massive jaws, revealing tusks.

Title: Mouse Face
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a mouse, looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as a gray or white mouse face with large, round ears, a pink, pointed nose, and whiskers. Often used with a more affectionate tone than the full-bodied 🐁 Mouse . Not to be confused with 🐹 Hamster Face . Google and Facebook’s designs feature a mouse with buck teeth. Microsoft’s design was previously brown.

Title: Mouse
Description: Eek! A mouse, a small rodent with large ears and a long tail. Generally depicted in white in full profile on all fours facing left, with pink ears, feet, and tail, often with reddish eyes. See also 🐭 Mouse Face . Not to be confused with 🐀 Rat or 🖱️ Computer Mouse . Facebook’s mouse is sitting on its hind legs. Google’s design was previously more cartoon-styled, standing on its hind legs and facing forward with a buck tooth. Microsoft’s mouse was previously brown.

Title: Rat
Description: A rat, a large rodent with a long tail, known to frequent big cities. Depicted in gray in full profile on all fours facing left, with pink ears, feet, and tail. May be use for various metaphorical senses of rat . Not to be confused with 🐁 Mouse , which has white hair. One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . Google’s design was previously standing on its hind legs and facing forward with a buck tooth.

Title: Hamster
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a hamster—a small rodent often kept as a pet—looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as a brown-and-white faced hamster with whiskers, a pink nose, puffy cheeks, and large, round, pink ears, sometimes with a buck tooth. Often used with an affectionate tone. May be used to represent a gerbil, guinea pig, chinchilla , or related animals. Does not have a full-bodied hamster emoji counterpart. Not to be confused with 🐭 Mouse Face . Microsoft’s hamster was previously gray.

Title: Rabbit Face
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a rabbit, looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as a gray and/or white rabbit face with upright ears and pink ears and nose, often with whiskers and a buck tooth. Often used with a more affectionate tone than the full-bodied 🐇 rabbit . Also often used to represent the Easter Bunny . Available as an Apple Animoji . Microsoft’s rabbit face was previously pink-colored with one ear flopping down. Facebook’s rabbit face was previously gray-colored with both ears flopping down.

Title: Rabbit
Description: A rabbit, a hoppy mammal with long ears. Depicted as a white, gray, or brown rabbit in full profile facing left with pink ears and a short tail, sitting on its long, hind legs or on all fours. May be used in association with spring , Easter , magic, bunny ears , or various rabbit-based characters or expressions (e.g., going down the rabbit hole ). See also 🐰 Rabbit Face . One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . Apple’s rabbit has red eyes, WhatsApp’s whiskers. Microsoft’s rabbit was previously brown, Facebook’s white.

Title: Chipmunk
Description: A chipmunk, a small rodent with puffy cheeks. Depicted as a brown chipmunk in full profile facing left, sitting on its hind legs with a bushy tail and striped body. Generally holding an acorn or other nut in its hands. May be used to represent a squirrel or related animals. At one point, Google’s chipmunk was looking forward, squinting with a buck tooth. Microsoft’s previous black-and-white design could be mistaken for a skunk .

Title: Beaver
Description: A brown beaver with buckteeth and a wide paddle-like tail. Can be used in the context of actual beavers, or metaphorically to evoke qualities of beavers like working hard, as in the expression beavering away . Commonly associated with Canada, as beavers are a national emblem of the country. May also be used in reference to the vagina, which is an informal sense of the word beaver .

Title: Hedgehog
Description: A hedgehog. A small, spiny mammal sometimes kept as a pet. Generally depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a round, brown body covered with spines and a light-brown face and underside. Sometimes used to represent a porcupine or echidna. Twitter's design has always been a hedgehog facing forward. Google's design originally featured a hedgehog facing forward, though it was changed to full profile with Android 11.0. Facebook’s design previously featured a hedgehog on its back, rolled up in a ball.

Title: Bat
Description: A bat, the flying mammal of the night. Variously depicted as a brown, black, or gray bat, with wings outspread and pointy ears, facing forward or left. Often used in association with Halloween , vampires , and Batman. Google’s bat was previously purplish in color, bearing two fangs. Samsung’s bat was previously brown, and Facebook’s gray.

Title: Bear
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of bear, looking straight ahead. Depicted as a brown bear with round ears and a tan muzzle. Resembles a teddy bear . Often used with an affectionate tone. Does not have a full-bodied bear emoji counterpart. May be used to refer to certain members of the LGBTQ community, a la the slang term "bear". Available as an Apple Animoji . Samsung’s bear was previously golden brown.

Title: Polar Bear
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of polar bear, looking straight ahead. Depicted as the face of a white bear with round ears. WhatsApp previously showed the full body of the bear.

Title: Koala
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a koala—a bear-like marsupial known for eating eucalyptus and sleeping—looking straight ahead. Depicted as a gray face with round, fluffy ears and a large, black nose. Often used with an affectionate tone and in association with Australia , where the animal is found. Available as an Apple Animoji . Google previously depicted a full-bodied koala climbing a tree, Softbank’s koala previously had brown fur.

Title: Panda
Description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a panda—a bear-like mammal known for eating bamboo—looking straight ahead. Depicted as a white panda face with black ears and black circles around its eyes. Often used with an affectionate tone and in association with China , where the animal is found. Sometimes used to represent a red panda. Does not have a full-bodied panda emoji counterpart. Available as an Apple Animoji . Google and Facebook’s pandas are shown smiling with an open mouth and tongue.

Title: Sloth
Description: A sloth, the slow-moving, tree-dwelling mammal. Depicted as a light-brown sloth with a wide, whitish, masked face hanging from a tree branch, facing left or right. Generally shown as a three-toed sloth.

Title: Otter
Description: An otter, the playful water mammal in the weasel family. Depicted as a light-brown otter on its back, with its forepaws held together and whiskered face to the left, generally with its long tail curled up. May be used to refer to certain members of the LGBTQ community, a la the slang term "otter". Apple’s otter is in water, holding a stone, as is Microsoft’s.

Title: Skunk
Description: A skunk, a bushy-tailed mammal that sprays a foul odor when threatened. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with black hair and its distinctive white stripe running from its head down to a curled-up tail. Google’s original skunk design bore a humorously haughty air.

Title: Kangaroo
Description: A kangaroo, a marsupial with a large tail and legs. Depicted in yellowish-brown in full profile facing left with large, pointed ears, shown either resting on its hind legs and tail or jumping. Commonly used in connection with Australia , where the animal is found.

Title: Badger
Description: A badger, a stocky mammal in the weasel family with a long, pointed head. Generally depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a gray coat, black-and-white-striped face, and short tail. Google’s design used to feature a friendly, cartoon-styled black-and-white badger face. Facebook’s badger is sitting on its hind legs.

Title: Turkey
Description: A turkey, a gobbling bird traditionally eaten at Thanksgiving or Christmas . Depicted in full profile facing left, standing on its legs with a dark-brown body, a white-fringed plume, pink or blue head, and its distinctive red snood and wattle . May be consumed in the form of 🍗 Poultry Leg .

Title: Chicken
Description: A chicken, a bird used for its meat and eggs . Generally depicted as the white head of a chicken (hen or rooster) looking left, with a yellow beak, red comb on its head, and red wattle on its neck. May be consumed in the form of 🍗 Poultry Leg . Not to be confused with the full-bodied 🐓 Rooster, though their applications overlap. Also may be used for metaphorical senses of chicken (e.g., “coward”). See also 🐣 Hatching Chick , 🐤 Baby Chick , and 🐥 Front-Facing Baby Chick . Available as an Apple Animoji . Twitter’s chicken head is looking straight ahead. Microsoft’s chicken was previously yellow, while Samsung’s faced forward; Facebook’s design once featured a full, brown bird, while Google’s design previously featured a full bodied chicken.

Title: Rooster
Description: A rooster (cock), a male chicken known for its cock-a-doodle-do. Depicted as a white or multicolored rooster standing on its legs in full profile facing left, with a red comb on its head and red wattle on its neck. Not to be confused with 🐔 Chicken , though their applications overlap. See also 🐣 Hatching Chick , 🐤 Baby Chick , and 🐥 Front-Facing Baby Chick . Occasionally used as sexual slang. One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac . Google’s rooster is brown with a green tail, Facebook’s brown with a blue tail. Google’s rooster was previously white, Microsoft’s yellow, Samsung’s looking straight ahead.

Title: Hatching Chick
